title: Elmer Flick T206s  FS/FT - No longer available
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: Elmer Flick T206s  FS/FT - No longer available
posts.post_content:
No longer available Im collecting Flick by T206 back and have the following 2 cards left for sale or trade as I have upgrades for them.  Prices are as follows:

Sovereign 150 - PSA 2.5 - low pop card and one of the better graded, no creases, only honest wear
Sovereign 350 - PSA 3.5 - no creases.  Compare my price to Sov 350’s on ebay.


Prices are net to me and include insured delivery.  Email with questions.  Thanks for looking.

Eric
